segments.text: You had better get a grab instead of getting upset about little things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . But my life seems super stressful . I really don ’ t know how to get a better grab on things .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think as long as you try your best and don ’ t think of anything too much , everything will be all right .
segments.speaker: S1
